{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=X6200 |fcc_date=03/29/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=Europe, Australia, New Zealand |type=dsl modem, wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-X6200 |ic_id=3839A-X6200 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8685P;RTL8685P, EAK57P2, GE46, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=1 |fla1=8 |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W631GG6KB-12 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8812AR;RTL8812AR, F5D58P2, GF23; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192ER;RTL8192ER, F4K23H1, GF26; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8214;RTL8214C, EAG32E2, GE44; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=ADSL2+, VDSL2 |addl_chips=ADSL2+ Analog Front End chip;Realtek;RTL8275;RTL8275, F1F00G1 GF04S;1; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }}
:• '''433Mbps''' - 1SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''750 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC750 ADSL/VDSL Dual-Band Wi-Fi Modem Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.linksys.com/gb/p/P-X6200/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=X6200|region=gb|pid=01t34000003qHhVAAU}} Despite being advertised as only supporting 433Mbps 802.11ac (1x stream), :the hardware appears to be capable of 867Mbps (2x stream). *[http://www.tomshardware.com/news/linksys-cable-modems-routers,30907.html ''Four New Linksys Cable Modems (CES)'' on '''TomsHardware'''] ===See also=== *[[Linksys CM3008]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 8x4 Cable Modem'' *[[Linksys CM3024]] - ''DOCSIS 3.0 24x8 Cable Modem'' *[[Linksys CG7500]] - ''AC1900 Cable Modem Router'' *[[Linksys X6200]] - ''ADSL/VDSL Dual-Band Wi-Fi Modem Router'' *[[Kasda KW62293]] - ''VDSL2 AC1200 WiFi Modem Router'' • [http://www.kasdanet.com/ENHCSZ/pro_view-74.html PPage] :CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8685P, xDSL AFE: [[Realtek]] RTL8275S :WLAN: [[Realtek]] RTL8192ER / [[Realtek]] RTL8188AR :Flash: 4MB, RAM: 64MB, 1x USB 2.0, 4x ext. antenna
